name: THE POCKET SIZED LIFE
description:
Ants work day and night to save up for the winter.

they don't sleep they don't rest.

but...

we, humans, are always finding ways to kill ants

not even due to any apparent reason.

that's propostrous!

this game will teach you the struggles of an ant

while event trying to find small amounts food

unlike other games, here you are the ant and 

go through the struggles and challenges and (rage) 

similar to what we give an ant in our everyday

W - UP

A -LEFT

S- RIGHT

D -DOWN

LEFT CLICK - PICKUP SUGAR

RIGHT CLICK - DROP SUGAR

E- ULTIMATE STING ATTACK

what do you say?

ARE YOU READY TO BECOME AN ANT?
